name: Brix Hit - 1010 Puzzle Game
description:
Brix Hit Puzzle is a fun line-destroying puzzle game that won’t let your brain get bored!
Place brightly colored blocks on the 1010 game field to build 10-block lines (horizontal and vertical). When 10-blocks line is build it will be immediately cleared away from the field.

The goal of Brix Hit 1010 Puzzle is to fill the grid with shapes to form a line. Drag the colorful block to create full lines. There is no need to match colours. Blocks can't be rotated.

So, be smart, try hard and get the highest score!

Features:
Easy & free to play
Colorful blocks
No time limits
Simple rules
Greatly addictive



Brix Hit Puzzle game is a real time killer. Play this puzzle game anytime, anywhere!
